body:
As much as Off Topic as this is, I ask for your support! I have enter fouseytube's contest for "becoming a youtuber" so please show support and like the video that I have entered with!


Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ddJu18UufQ 


Thanks for the support everyone!

reply_to.body:
gibbodaman, I thought that you were better than this. Not only do you start a flame war on my thread about this, but on Mustard's as well.
If him and I really are passionate about this competition, and we want to become youtubers, you are no one to stop us from that.
You are those people who try to stop us, and if we make a video that we think will get us far, you try to bring us down.

Mustard, I suggest you just ignore gobbodaman from now on. That is what I am doing. I'm sure that you will become a big YouTuber if you try, so don't let anyone put you down.

Good luck!

replies.body_tagged: I think your awesome! Dontlet people talk down to you. Thats why I started ignoring Gibb.

reply_to.body:
I read your profile already.
How did you know that I'm kid? Do you know how old I am? Maybe I'm 14? or I'm 21? Who knows. And btw being a kid is nothing bad, you can enjoy the life, you don't have to think about money and adult things. I'm not tring to bring up a flamewar, I want to stop it. And how the hell you think, I'm thinking you are a evil national socialist? Do you even know what they did? Do you know? I'm german, I know what this mean! That is not okay! You don't know how it feels if the half of the world thinks you are an nazi just because you come from germany. I already made this experience! And I grow up, if you ask my friends, my teachers, my parents, they will say I'm further than all of my classmates. Think of that! JUST THINK OF THAT. Actually this makes me really really sad.

I read your profile already.
How did you know that I'm kid? Do you know how old I am? Maybe I'm 14? or I'm 21? Who knows. And I grow up, if you ask my friends, my teachers, my parents, they will say I'm further than all of my classmates. Think of that! JUST THINK OF THAT. Actually this makes me really really sad.

replies.body:
Ok, everyone...

I have cleaned up this thread, and a warning to everyone; especially the players involved with the argument:

Negative comments are not allowed on threads which attempt to shed light onto their future. 
Gibbo, this is mainly directed at you; as your comments are extremely disrespectful. I know it's not quite a flame war, however you have the intention in being rude towards the community. *(Not just this thread FYI)*. Therefore, I have come to a decision to forum ban you temporarily. Good luck on your entry, Mustard :)
